feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The student implemented a working financial app that computes NPV, IRR, payback, and scenario sensitivity, and they validated results against an external calculator. Combined with input handling and iterative improvements (Implement, Validate, Evolve), this demonstrates thorough, functioning financial application capabilities.
- Integrate AI: The submission shows concrete AI integration that adds analytical and explanatory value (automated NPV/IRR, recommendations, sensitivity scenarios, input parsing and validation) rather than superficial use. Driver stages—Discover, Represent, Implement, Validate, and Evolve—provide evidence of effective, iterative AI incorporation, meeting the PASS threshold.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "For the discover stage, what financial decision needs explanation, not just a calculation. So an investment analysis that goes beyond numbers using NPV."
"I went ahead and implemented this into Google AI studio... I made it so if you put in a project life of 0 years to tell you that there was an error and that it must be a positive number."

"for the validate stage I went ahead and put those same cash flows into a net present value calculator and as we can see here uh the 22,637,185 uh is the same from uh the app. So we can validate it and say that the calculations are correct."
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover: identified a concrete financial decision (investment analysis using NPV). Implement: built the tool in Google AI Studio, added input validation and payback calculation. Validate/Evolve: confirmed outputs vs. an external NPV calculator and added sensitivity analysis and scenarios.
criteria.reasoning: The student implemented a working financial app that computes NPV, IRR, payback, and scenario sensitivity, and they validated results against an external calculator. Combined with input handling and iterative improvements (Implement, Validate, Evolve), this demonstrates thorough, functioning financial application capabilities.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "I went ahead and implemented this into Google AI studio."
"So for the represent stage, how can AI make this smarter? the AI can give you an analysis and explain whether to invest or not by explaining the numbers and what they mean."
"And then the recommendation is accept. ... This positive NPV confirms substantial value creation and an efficient uh capital recovery for the organization."
criteria.driver_alignment: Implemented (implemented the tool in Google AI Studio), Represent (AI provides analysis/explanations and decisions), Validate/Evolve (validation of calculations and added sensitivity and payback features show iterative improvement).
criteria.reasoning: The submission shows concrete AI integration that adds analytical and explanatory value (automated NPV/IRR, recommendations, sensitivity scenarios, input parsing and validation) rather than superficial use. Driver stages—Discover, Represent, Implement, Validate, and Evolve—provide evidence of effective, iterative AI incorporation, meeting the PASS threshold.
